compose:
services:
  app:
    image: coolfan1024/xiaomi-album-syncer:latest
    container_name: xiaomi-album-syncer
    ports:
      - "38232:8080"
    volumes:
      - ./download:/app/download
      - ./db:/app/db
    restart: unless-stopped
